cast.overview: In the town of Blithe Hollow, Norman Babcock can speak to the dead, but no one other than his eccentric new friend believes his ability is real. One day, Norman's eccentric uncle tells him of a ritual he must perform to protect the town from a curse cast by a witch centuries ago.
cast.title: ParaNorman

cast.overview: "This Is Spinal Tap" shines a light on the self-contained universe of a metal band struggling to get back on the charts, including everything from its complicated history of ups and downs, gold albums, name changes and undersold concert dates, along with the full host of requisite groupies, promoters, hangers-on and historians, sessions, release events and those special behind-the-scenes moments that keep it all real.
cast.title: This Is Spinal Tap

details.biography: Lara Cody was born on September 8, 1957 in Los Angeles, California, USA. She is known for her work on Akira (1988), Vampire Hunter D (1985) and Metal Gear Solid 2: Sons of Liberty (2001).
details.name: Lara Cody
